verses.verse: וּבִ֨נְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> u-Vin-ya-Min, Now Benjamin הוֹלִ֖יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּ֣לַע <S%H1106><s%> Be-la' Bela בְּכֹר֑וֹ <S%H1060><s%> be-cho-Ro; his firstborn אַשְׁבֵּל֙ <S%H788><s%> 'ash-Bel Ashbel הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, the second וְאַחְרַ֖ח <S%H315><s%> ve-'ach-Rach and Aharah הַשְּׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi. the third
נוֹחָה֙ <S%H5119><s%> no-Chah Nohah הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I, the fourth וְרָפָ֖א <S%H7498><s%> ve-ra-Fa and Rapha הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shi. the fifth ס sa-Mek

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu had בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim And the sons לְבָ֑לַע <S%H1106><s%> le-Va-la'; of Bela אַדָּ֥ר <S%H146><s%> 'ad-Dar were Addar וְגֵרָ֖א <S%H1617><s%> ve-ge-Ra and Gera וַאֲבִיהֽוּד׃ <S%H31><s%> va-'a-vi-Hud. and Abihud
וַאֲבִישׁ֥וּעַ <S%H50><s%> va-'a-vi-Shu-a' And Abishua וְנַעֲמָ֖ן <S%H5283><s%> ve-na-'a-Man and Naaman וַאֲחֽוֹחַ׃ <S%H265><s%> va-'a-Cho-ach. and Ahoah
וְגֵרָ֥א <S%H1617><s%> ve-ge-Ra And Gera וּשְׁפוּפָ֖ן <S%H8197><s%> u-she-fu-Fan and Shephuphan וְחוּרָֽם׃ <S%H2361><s%> ve-chu-Ram. and Huram

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And these [are] the sons אֵח֑וּד <S%H261><s%> 'e-Chud; of Ehud אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these הֵ֞ם <S%H1992><s%> hem like רָאשֵׁ֤י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei these are the heads אָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> a-Vot of the fathers לְי֣וֹשְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> le-Yoo-she-vei of the inhabitants גֶ֔בַע <S%H1387><s%> Ge-va', of Geba וַיַּגְל֖וּם <S%H1540><s%> vai-yag-Lum and they removed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מָנָֽחַת׃ <S%H4506><s%> ma-Na-chat. them to Manahath

וְנַעֲמָ֧ן <S%H5283><s%> ve-na-'a-Man And Naaman וַאֲחִיָּ֛ה <S%H281><s%> va-'a-chi-Yah and Ahiah וְגֵרָ֖א <S%H1617><s%> ve-ge-Ra and Gera ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he הֶגְלָ֑ם <S%H1540><s%> heg-Lam; he removed וְהוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> ve-ho-Lid them and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֻזָּ֖א <S%H5798><s%> 'uz-Za Uzza וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲחִיחֻֽד׃ <S%H284><s%> 'a-chi-Chud. and Ahihud

וְשַׁחֲרַ֗יִם <S%H7842><s%> ve-sha-cha-Ra-yim, And Shaharaim הוֹלִיד֙ <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> bis-Deh [children] in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of Moab מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- after שִׁלְח֖וֹ <S%H7971><s%> shil-Cho he had sent them away אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam; חוּשִׁ֥ים <S%H2366><s%> chu-Shim Hushim וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בַּעֲרָ֖א <S%H1199><s%> ba-'a-Ra and Baara נָשָֽׁיו׃ <S%H802><s%> na-Shav. [were] his wives

וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> vai-Yo-led And he begat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- By חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2321><s%> Cho-desh of Hodesh אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To; his wife אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹבָב֙ <S%H3103><s%> yo-Vav Jobab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et צִבְיָ֔א <S%H6644><s%> tziv-Ya, and Zibia וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מֵישָׁ֖א <S%H4331><s%> mei-Sha and Mesha וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַלְכָּֽם׃ <S%H4445><s%> mal-Kam. and Malcham

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יְע֥וּץ <S%H3263><s%> ye-'Utz And Jeuz וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שָֽׂכְיָ֖ה <S%H7634><s%> sa-che-Yah and Shachia וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִרְמָ֑ה <S%H4821><s%> mir-Mah; and Mirma אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav These [were] his sons רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei heads אָבֽוֹת׃ <S%H1><s%> a-Vot. of the fathers

וּמֵחֻשִׁ֛ים <S%H2366><s%> u-me-chu-Shim And of Hushim הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲבִיט֖וּב <S%H36><s%> 'a-vi-Tuv Abitub וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֶלְפָּֽעַל׃ <S%H508><s%> 'el-Pa-'al. and Elpaal

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei The sons אֶלְפַּ֔עַל <S%H508><s%> 'el-Pa-'al, of Elpaal עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5677><s%> 'E-ver Eber וּמִשְׁעָ֖ם <S%H4936><s%> u-mish-'Am and Misham וָשָׁ֑מֶד <S%H8106><s%> va-Sha-med; and Shamed ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu who בָּנָ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> ba-Nah who built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אוֹנ֔וֹ <S%H207><s%> o-No, Ono וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et לֹ֖ד <S%H3850><s%> lod and Lod וּבְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-ha. with the towns

וּבְרִעָ֣ה <S%H1283><s%> u-ve-ri-'Ah Beriah וָשֶׁ֔מַע <S%H8087><s%> va-She-ma', also and Shema הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah who רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei [were] heads הָאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot, of the fathers לְיוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> le-yo-she-Vei of the inhabitants אַיָּל֑וֹן <S%H357><s%> ai-ya-Lon; of Aijalon הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah who הִבְרִ֖יחוּ <S%H1272><s%> hiv-Ri-chu who drove away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- י֥וֹשְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> Yoo-she-vei the inhabitants גַֽת׃ <S%H1661><s%> Gat. of Gath
וְאַחְי֥וֹ <S%H283><s%> ve-'ach-Yo And Ahio שָׁשָׁ֖ק <S%H8349><s%> sha-Shak Shashak וִירֵמֽוֹת׃ <S%H3406><s%> vi-re-Mot. and Jeremoth
וּזְבַדְיָ֥ה <S%H2069><s%> u-ze-vad-Yah And Zebadiah וַעֲרָ֖ד <S%H6166><s%> va-'a-Rad and Arad וָעָֽדֶר׃ <S%H5738><s%> va-'A-der. and Ader

וּמִיכָאֵ֧ל <S%H4317><s%> u-mi-cha-'El And Michael וְיִשְׁפָּ֛ה <S%H3472><s%> ve-yish-Pah and Ispah וְיוֹחָ֖א <S%H3109><s%> ve-yo-Cha and Joha בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons בְרִיעָֽה׃ <S%H1283><s%> ve-ri-'Ah. of Beriah

וּזְבַדְיָ֥ה <S%H2069><s%> u-ze-vad-Yah And Zebadiah וּמְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <S%H4918><s%> u-me-shul-Lam and Meshullam וְחִזְקִ֥י <S%H2395><s%> ve-chiz-Ki and Hezeki וָחָֽבֶר׃ <S%H2268><s%> va-Cha-ver. and Heber

וְיִשְׁמְרַ֧י <S%H3461><s%> ve-yish-me-Rai Ishmerai וְיִזְלִיאָ֛ה <S%H3152><s%> ve-yiz-li-'Ah also and Jezliah וְיוֹבָ֖ב <S%H3103><s%> ve-yo-Vav and Jobab בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons אֶלְפָּֽעַל׃ <S%H508><s%> 'el-Pa-'al. of Elpaal
וְיָקִ֥ים <S%H3356><s%> ve-ya-Kim And Jakim וְזִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> ve-zich-Ri and Zichri וְזַבְדִּֽי׃ <S%H2067><s%> ve-zav-Di. and Zabdi
וֶאֱלִיעֵנַ֥י <S%H462><s%> ve-'e-li-'e-Nai And Elienai וְצִלְּתַ֖י <S%H6769><s%> ve-tzil-le-Tai and Zilthai וֶאֱלִיאֵֽל׃ <S%H447><s%> ve-'e-li-'El. and Eliel

וַעֲדָיָ֧ה <S%H5718><s%> va-'a-da-Yah And Adaiah וּבְרָאיָ֛ה <S%H1256><s%> u-ve-ra-Yah and Beraiah וְשִׁמְרָ֖ת <S%H8119><s%> ve-shim-Rat and Shimrath בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons שִׁמְעִֽי׃ <S%H8096><s%> shim-'I. of Shimhi
וְיִשְׁפָּ֥ן <S%H3473><s%> ve-yish-Pan And Ishpan וָעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5677><s%> va-'E-ver and Heber וֶאֱלִיאֵֽל׃ <S%H447><s%> ve-'e-li-'El. and Eliel
וְעַבְדּ֥וֹן <S%H5658><s%> ve-'av-Don And Abdon וְזִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> ve-zich-Ri and Zichri וְחָנָֽן׃ <S%H2605><s%> ve-cha-Nan. and Hanan
וַחֲנַנְיָ֥ה <S%H2608><s%> va-cha-nan-Yah And Hananiah וְעֵילָ֖ם <S%H5867><s%> ve-'ei-Lam and Elam וְעַנְתֹתִיָּֽה׃ <S%H6070><s%> ve-'an-to-ti-Yah. and Antothijah

וְיִפְדְיָ֥ה <S%H3301><s%> ve-yif-de-Yah And Iphedeiah; וּפְנִיאֵל u-fe-ni-'el כוּפְנוּאֵ֖ל <S%H6439><s%> u-fe-nu-'El Peniel קבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons שָׁשָֽׁק׃ <S%H8349><s%> sha-Shak. of Shashak
וְשַׁמְשְׁרַ֥י <S%H8125><s%> ve-sham-she-Rai And Shamsherai וּשְׁחַרְיָ֖ה <S%H7841><s%> u-she-char-Yah and Shehariah וַעֲתַלְיָֽה׃ <S%H6271><s%> va-'a-tal-Yah. and Athaliah

וְיַעֲרֶשְׁיָ֧ה <S%H3298><s%> ve-ya-'a-resh-Yah And Jaresiah וְאֵלִיָּ֛ה <S%H452><s%> ve-'e-li-Yah and Eliah וְזִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> ve-zich-Ri and Zichri בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons יְרֹחָֽם׃ <S%H3395><s%> ye-ro-Cham. of Jeroham

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei These [were] heads אָב֛וֹת <S%H1><s%> a-Vot of the fathers לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֖ם <S%H8435><s%> le-to-le-do-Tam by their generations רָאשִׁ֑ים <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shim; chief אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh who יָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-Vu [men] These dwelt בִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> vi-ru-sha-Lim. in Jerusalem ס sa-Mek

וּבְגִבְע֥וֹן <S%H1391><s%> u-ve-giv-'on And at Gibeon יָשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-Vu dwelt אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father גִבְע֑וֹן <S%H1391><s%> giv-'on; of Gibeon וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To whose wife's מַעֲכָֽה׃ <S%H4601><s%> ma-'a-Chah. [was] Maachah

וּבְנ֥וֹ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-No son הַבְּכ֖וֹר <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-Chor And his firstborn עַבְדּ֑וֹן <S%H5658><s%> av-Don; Abdon וְצ֥וּר <S%H6698><s%> ve-Tzur and Zur וְקִ֖ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> ve-Kish and Kish וּבַ֥עַל <S%H1168><s%> u-Va-'al and Baal וְנָדָֽב׃ <S%H5070><s%> ve-na-Dav. and Nadab
וּגְד֥וֹר <S%H1446><s%> u-ge-Dor And Gedor וְאַחְי֖וֹ <S%H283><s%> ve-'ach-Yo and Ahio וָזָֽכֶר׃ <S%H2144><s%> va-Za-cher. and Zacher

וּמִקְל֖וֹת <S%H4732><s%> u-mik-Lot And Mikloth הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שִׁמְאָ֑ה <S%H8039><s%> shim-'Ah; Shimeah וְאַף־ <S%H637><s%> ve-'af- And these also הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah, like נֶ֧גֶד <S%H5048><s%> Ne-ged over against them אֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Hem with their brethren יָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-Vu dwelt בִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> vi-ru-sha-Lim in Jerusalem עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Hem. their relatives ס sa-Mek

וְנֵר֙ <S%H5369><s%> ve-Ner And Ner הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קִ֔ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> Kish, Kish וְקִ֖ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> ve-Kish and Kish הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul; Saul וְשָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> ve-sha-'Ul, and Saul הוֹלִ֤יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan Jonathan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַלְכִּי־ mal-ki- שׁ֔וּעַ <S%H4444><s%> Shu-a', and Malchishua וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲבִֽינָדָ֖ב <S%H41><s%> 'a-vi-na-Dav and Abinadab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֶשְׁבָּֽעַל׃ <S%H792><s%> 'esh-Ba-'al. and Eshbaal

וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ven- And the son יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan of Jonathan מְרִ֣יב me-Riv בָּ֑עַל <S%H4807><s%> Ba-'al; [was] Meribbaal וּמְרִ֥יב u-me-Riv בַּ֖עַל <S%H4807><s%> Ba-'al and Meribbaal הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִיכָֽה׃ <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah. Micah ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons מִיכָ֑ה <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah; of Micah פִּית֥וֹן <S%H6377><s%> pi-Ton [were] Pithon וָמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4429><s%> va-Me-lech and Melech וְתַאְרֵ֥עַ <S%H8390><s%> ve-ta'-Re-a' and Tarea וְאָחָֽז׃ <S%H271><s%> ve-'a-Chaz. and Ahaz

וְאָחָז֙ <S%H271><s%> ve-'a-Chaz And Ahaz הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוֹעַדָּ֔ה <S%H3085><s%> ye-ho-'ad-Dah, Jehoadah וִיהֽוֹעַדָּ֗ה <S%H3085><s%> vi-ho-'ad-Dah, and Jehoadah הוֹלִ֛יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עָלֶ֥מֶת <S%H5964><s%> 'a-Le-met Alemeth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַזְמָ֖וֶת <S%H5820><s%> 'az-Ma-vet and Azmaveth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et זִמְרִ֑י <S%H2174><s%> zim-Ri; and Zimri וְזִמְרִ֖י <S%H2174><s%> ve-zim-Ri and Zimri הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מוֹצָֽא׃ <S%H4162><s%> mo-Tza. Moza

וּמוֹצָ֖א <S%H4162><s%> u-mo-Tza And Moza הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּנְעָ֑א <S%H1150><s%> bin-'A; Binea רָפָ֥ה <S%H7498><s%> ra-Fah Rapha בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No [was] his son אֶלְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H501><s%> 'el-'a-Sah Eleasah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son אָצֵ֥ל <S%H682><s%> 'a-Tzel Azel בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. his son
